content.title: Karma Sathi Prakalpa
content.details: The Government of West Bengal has taken remarkable initiatives in employment generation for the promising youth by opening new doors to help intending or prospective entrepreneurs and make them self-dependent, those who are interested in new ventures. Employment generation is one of the thrust areas of the State Government, and because of that Government of West Bengal has launched and announced the West Bengal Karma Sathi Prakalpa Scheme 2020. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance and help passionate and prospective young entrepreneurs to start their own businesses as self-employed youth who will become employers in the future and generate more employment.
benefits: Loans of up to â‚¹2,00,000/- for each beneficiary
Subsidies for taking up new projects
Target of providing loans to one lakh youths every year
eligibility: Any intending or prospective entrepreneur fulfilling the conditions
Only one member of a family shall be eligible to apply
Educational Qualification: Minimum Class VIII passed
content.application_process: Online and Offline. Applicants need to visit the official website, register as a new user, and fill in the necessary information.

faqs.question: What is Karma Sathi Prakalpa Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Government of West Bengal has taken remarkable initiatives in employment generation for the promising youth through opening new doors to help intending or prospective entrepreneurs and make them self-dependent.

faqs.question: Who are the beneficiaries under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Any intending or prospective entrepreneur fulfilling the conditions can apply. Only one member from a family shall be eligible to apply.

faqs.question: Is there any age criteria?
faqs.answer: Yes, any intending or prospective entrepreneur in the age group 18 - 50 years.

faqs.question: What are mandatory information required to fill up during form submission?
faqs.answer: Applicant Full Name, Father's / Mother's / Guardian's Name, Applicant Date of Birth, Gender, Full Address for communication and project location, Education Qualification, Applicant Category, Project Name, Project Cost, Co-operative Bank Name & Address.

faqs.question: Is there any requirement for the submission of fees for online registration?
faqs.answer: No, there is no requirement for the submission of fees for online registration.
